alert.note: Alert for Harrison; Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 6:55AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Harrison and west central Jackson Counties through 730 AM CDT... At 655 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Biloxi, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Biloxi, D`iberville, Lyman and Latimer. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 35 and 45. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
